publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5251 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Bankruptcy and Diligence (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Bankruptcy and Diligence (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated, each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 9: 40 minutes Groups 10 to 13: 1 hour 20 minutes Groups 14 to 16: 2 hours Groups 17 to 19: 2 hours 50 minutes Groups 20 to 31: 3 hours 20 minutes Supported by: George Lyon*
